DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate sustainable pain control utilize multiple waveform enable neurostimulator patient chronic , intractable pain trunk and/or limb .
DOC.brief_title: Multi-center Prospective Study Determining Sustainability Pain Relief Psychosocial Functional Responses When Utilizing Multiple Waveform Enabled Neurostimulator
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate sustainable pain control utilize Prodigy Proclaim Elite family neurostimulators use tonic BurstDR waveform . Subjects enrol prior device trial evaluation period . Once subject permanent system implant , return clinic follow visit 3 , 6 , 12 , 18 24 month post permanent implant .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject chronic , intractable pain trunk and/or limb , include unilateral bilateral pain associate follow : fail back surgery syndrome intractable low back leg pain . 2 . Subject score 6 high NRS average pain specific area ( ) chronic pain treat past 24 hour baseline visit . 3 . Subject consider Investigator candidate implantation spinal cord stimulator system accord system Instructions For Use . 4 . Subject 18 year age old time enrollment . 5 . Subject willing cooperate study requirement include compliance regimen completion study visit . 6 . Subject sign receive copy Ethics Committee/Institutional Review Board ( EC/IRB ) approve informed consent . 1 . Subject currently spinal cord stimulation system implant . 2 . Subject previously fail SCS therapy ( either trial system evaluation permanent implant ) . 3 . Subject primary diagnosis Peripheral Vascular Disease ( PVD ) , Angina Pectoris , Chronic Migraine . 4 . Subject plan Peripheral Nerve Stimulation system ( PNS ) , Peripheral Nerve field Stimulation system ( PNfS ) , Dorsal Root Ganglion system ( DRG ) , implantable infusion pump . 5 . Subject currently participate another clinical investigation active treatment arm . 6 . Subject unable read and/or write .
